website_summaries.verdict: Well-known for their secure cases for phones and tablets, the iPad Air case offers the quality and protection you'd expect from OtterBox.
pros: Includes an inner shell, outer cover, and a screen protector for the ultimate protection from bumps, drops, and other accidents
Made of high-quality materials that last a long time
Outer cover includes a stand and port covers
cons: This case is fairly bulky and can be difficult to get on and off

customer_reviews.title: Used in construction and they are great
customer_reviews.text: These are great. We use them in construction. I've had them come back to the office and the OtterBox is trashed, lenses scratched, corner broken after being dropped. I take the iPad out and they literally look brand new. They last well over a year. The guys are brutal on them.
customer_reviews.author: C and K's Mom/Dad

customer_reviews.title: Substandard
customer_reviews.text: Not up to otterbox standards. Have otterbox for my iPhone which is unbelievable. Case for the iPad air2 was a complete disappointment. It was fine at the start, but then started to lose its shape. Before long, the outer edges began to get very loose and annoying when handling the iPad. The outer case became so stretched, I had to try to use the "boiling technique" to return it to its original form. Although it was better for a short period of time, the outer case bagan to stretch worse than the first time. I've since given up and now looking for a new case. This one is not worth the money, sorry to say.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: This is a Must if you have Kids
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 year old daughter and I’ve tried several cases prior to ordering this one. I must say, this case is excellent! It covers every single aspect of the iPad. The first day I bought it, my daughter spilled yogurt on the screen, luckily the case comes with a screen protector and it was an easy clean! Also it is a peace of mind knowing that all the ports are covered very well! Excellent case!
customer_reviews.author: Jose C.

customer_reviews.title: find one here and go to your local Best Buy and show it to them
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews said this would fit the 5th generation (2017) ipad so I tried it. Technically the case does fit ,however , the volume buttons on the ipad do not line up with the slots in the case and the sleep button is so tight it keeps going to the "slide to shut off" screen. If you want an Otterbox, find one here and go to your local Best Buy and show it to them. They will price match it. That's what I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protection at a quality price
customer_reviews.text: The newest version of the otterbox iPad case fits extremely well. No rattle or shake. The plastic frame and rubber outer have been designed thinner, but without sacrificing strength and durability. I have been using these cases for years now on all my work issued iPads and they all have survived perfectly. If you take care of your tools they will take care of you.
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh C Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Good durable Ipad case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of the otter box Defender Cases for our two IPad Air 2 to replace the 5 year old cases that were dropped numerous times and finally cracked. The case is very durable and protects the IPad nicely, it even has a built in screen protector. The screen protector does affect the touch screen sensibility slightly but not enough to make a big difference and is a acceptable compromise for the protection it offers. The only downside is the cost. For some reason the price of the case for the 2nd generation IPad Air is a lot more than the other IPads.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: The best protection you can buy.
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a few reviews complaining about missing features on this case. For me added features are nice, but not required. I purchased the OtterBox Defender for one reason, the best protection on the market. Yes, it is expensive, but with the peace of mind this case offers, it is well worth it. The case is substantial and hefty leaving me with a secure feeling about my $500 apple investment. The tilting function is a nice feature that will get plenty of use. Would have been nice to be able to access that function w/o removing the lower shell, however that is a minor complaint. Very happy with this product overall and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad J. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchaser.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent strong product. I am unclear whether it is waterproof. Otherwise, I have praise for the product. While I did have trouble understanding the instructions, some excellent YouTube videos will have everything in order quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Thackaberry

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the i-pad of our Downs Syndrome adult son, he is very hard on his i-pad and we were looking for strength and durability. This has been a good choice so far.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: great investment and it was cheaply priced
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this case. Protects her Ipad...its very well made, great investment and it was cheaply priced. Great seller, will buy from again. 5 star transaction
customer_reviews.author: David A. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased this. My ipad is in great shape two years later. The bummer is the charging port won't be compatible with some third party wires. No problems with OEM wires, though. Tough as nails. You'll be happy that first time you fumble and yell "Oh s***t!" as you watch it catapult to the concrete or tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Collins

customer_reviews.title: OtterBox Does it again, Again!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a long time customer of OtterBox and have always gone through Amazon to get them because of the price difference between Amazon and retailers. OtterBox products have never left me disappointed and this Defender Series Case for the iPad Air has left me very satisfied. Dropping the iPad leaves the user with no concern for damage externally and internally. If you travel and use your iPad a lot out of the home this is the best case to get. OtterBox has great customer service on top of their great products so its an easy decision to purchase OtterBox - and of course buy it through Amazon and save yourself some money.
customer_reviews.author: Soled Sanekee

customer_reviews.title: This is one tough, rugged case!
customer_reviews.text: This is typical Otterbox durablity. I willl only buy Otterbox for my tablets and cellphones. I have never found a better, more protective case for my equipment. I work in lawn and landscaping and our environment is far from clean and dust-free. This Otterbox Defender keeps my iPad clean and safe while being tossed around in the truck and on our equipment. And, Otterbox is a great company to deal with, too. They go out of their way to satisfy their customers. I give this a "two thumbs up."
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It is super heavy, though
customer_reviews.text: This case has already saved my iPad Air so many times. It is super heavy, though. My wrist actually gets tired after prolonged use without using the stand, but it's worth it for the peace of mind that my iPad isn't going to get damaged easily. I think the only thing I would change is making it non-glare. It really blinds me sometimes when the light hits it just right.
customer_reviews.author: Vaelorn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. I like to remove the screen protector ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I like to remove the screen protector from the otterbox as I find the tactile feel of the screen is negatively affected. I also find that as long as I am careful not to place abrasive things on the ipad screen that my screen is not at undue risk for being scratched. I've traveled to many countries around the world with this as well as using it on a daily basis. Occasionally I'll drop it and of course I don't worry one bit. The stand is convenient too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Smoothshifter

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: I have used otter boxes on all of my iPads in the past and when I got my iPad air I got the same otter box defender series I always get. The pros of this case is, it isn't horribly bulky and fits the iPad perfectly. Another pro is that it comes with a stand/front cover, so when you sit somewhere and want the iPad to sit up on your lap you can just disconnect the stand from the back so, it fits comfortly on your lap. The only con is that on this model that removed the magnets so when you take the cover off the screen doesn't unlock for you.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Oops, wrong case!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong OtterBox Defender Series Case for my iPad Air 2. Vendor needs to note exact iPad model the case fits. If it was there I did not find easily enough. iPad fit in case fine but things did not line up too well. But case was durable looking and I felt my iPad Air 2 would have been safe in it.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR IPAD5!! But it will fit
customer_reviews.text: Annoying and difficult to install, but a quality product. It WILL fit a 5th gen iPad, but the volume buttons won’t line up properly. To me, it’s worth a $40 savings to be inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Great product and lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: Great product and lasts a long time. It's worth a little bulkyness for real protection. My last i-pad and phone lasted years in it's OtterBox. The stand it has works great and keeps it in place when using it. I've traveled and dropped it many times with not damage. If your into prtection this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy J Fox

customer_reviews.title: Strong Case for the iPad
customer_reviews.text: I got just what I ordered in a timely manner at a fair price. Recommended. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: SamJr

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for iPad air
customer_reviews.text: Bought a cover several years ago and it never quite fit around the corners. This one does! Fits great and its sturdy. I like the cover which turns into a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This is a serious case. If you are worried about dropping your iPad, buy this thing. My son has dropped ours several times, with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: guinness

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best case / cover for Apple products !
customer_reviews.text: Have always used Otterbox for my iPhone and iPad and always very satisfied with the protection and functionality they provide. I've tried other cases and been disappointed for one reason or another. Otterbox is the gold standard. Choose wisely and invest in a quality case to protect your investment and provide an easy-to-use, comfortable experience using your iPhone or iPad. Great product. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad Air protection, but it's not compact.
customer_reviews.text: I had this same model case for an older iPad and loved it. So I bought one for my new iPad Air. Some people don't like that it makes the iPad Air much thicker and heavier, but I was more concerned about protecting the iPad Air than keeping it light and small. This new version of the case includes a screen protector built in. It can cause some strange glare and reflections in bright sunlight conditions. The old model did not have the built-in screensaver. Overall I'm very happy with the case. If you want something super compact, this probably isn't the case for you, but if you want ultimate protection, it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Great case, but they are NOT made in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case, but they are NOT made in the USA anymore and their warranty is only one year now. Used to be made on Colorado and had limited lifetime warranty. Still, a decent case though.
customer_reviews.author: GregoryAT

customer_reviews.title: Turns the Air into a Toughbook
customer_reviews.text: We use iPad as tools, not toys or entertainment. While hesitant to bulk up the wonderfully light and compact iPad Air, the OtterBox Defender case allows us to throw the tablet around, stuff it in a workbag, and use it at the beach. Note that the opening for the lighting connector is a little narrow, so while it fits the Apple connector fine, other third party connectors that are slightly wider will not fit.

customer_reviews.title: Makes my iPad practically bulletproof
customer_reviews.text: Amazing protection. Saved my iPad numerous times from very bad falls
customer_reviews.author: Snake-Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox Defender Series
customer_reviews.text: I have these for my Iphone and my new Ipad Air. I love them. They are super protective, may be a bit heavy, but when you spend the $$ I did on the largest Ipad Air available (in GB) you want to make sure it will not break if dropped or mishandled in any way. It is also great for my phone. I have a special non-sliding pad on the dash of my Jeep, I lay the case there and it is handy if I need it. I do NOT drive and talk or text, though!
customer_reviews.author: SaraJane

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect against drops
customer_reviews.text: I have an Otterbox defender on my phone (which has been dropped numerous times without damage) so I decided to get the same type of case for my son's iPad. It was accidentally dropped one time and the case did not protect the iPad from getting a large crack across the screen. This would be a great case for normal/adult use but I would NOT recommend it for use with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 1

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Works w/the new IPad (spring 2017- '5th Gen')
customer_reviews.text: This is at least my 4th Otterbox product... VERY RUGGED as always & will protect your new IPad released in Spring 2017, the so-called '5th Generation Ipad'. Fits perfectly. ONLY issue I see is that IPad volume buttons (up/down) don't quite line up with volume buttons on THIS Otterbox product BUT you can manipulate IPad volume buttons easily WITHOUT removing Otterbox. Until Otterbox comes out with a new product specifically designed for the new IPad, this is a great affordable 'insurance policy' to protect your new 2017 IPAD.
customer_reviews.author: Occupy Bawl Street com

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: Was as described. Fits great. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MyNameDoesntMatter

customer_reviews.title: Adds bulk.
customer_reviews.text: Best protection ever. Super heavy duty case for iPad. Adds more bulk but it's worth it to me.Had to buy another iPad because of a cheap case that failed.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It has a built in screen protector, which is a necessity as far as I am concerned. The snap on cover can be used on the front when your ipad is in your purse or messenger bag, and it can snap onto the back when you are using it. The snap on cover also allows you to prop up the screen to two different angles for convenient viewing or for use with a wireless keyboard. In fact, I was so pleased with it that I bought a second one for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Diffey

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but it will do gor now
customer_reviews.text: It fit new ipad 2017 but buttons are off and makes thumb sign in use less
customer_reviews.author: relaxinginaz

customer_reviews.title: Super protection
customer_reviews.text: I have used OtterBox for other devices. This one is the same. Great quality and great protection. The case was tight to get on. It fits perfect, there is no extra room for the iPad to jiggle around. Great feel and good grip while holding it. I always found the naked iPad a little slippery. I like the screen protector and did not notice any lack of feel on the touch screen. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ShaneH

customer_reviews.title: No comparison on the market!
customer_reviews.text: If you truly value your iPad and protection is paramount, then this is the case for you. Period. I bought another case on the Apple site when I purchased the iPad, but it truly did not protect as I'd wanted. When I saw this come on Amazon, I ordered it and I could not be happier. This brand has saved my iPhone over and over and it will save my iPad now over and over, as well. It's expensive and a little heavy, but it gets the job done and THAT'S what I pay for. Too much junk on the market. This is the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Spanky

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat Otterbox.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. Extremely tough and resilient. Not light. Adds a good deal more weight.
customer_reviews.author: William Boland

customer_reviews.title: Be careful buying this product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the protective screen! IT'S HORRIBLE!!!! It's like typing that requires a hammer Many portions of the iPad screen doesn't work. I have an Otter iPhone and I'm very happy with. I gave this two stars because I think the case may be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Frey

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: Dropped it a couple,times not a scratch. It has a kick stand,Unfortunately it broke. The stand is flimsy, but in this case I think it’s operator error.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Heavy protection.. But not from dust.
customer_reviews.text: It definitely got the job done and protected my iPad. My only issue is that even after you put on the case, you can still get dust and particles underneath and they get really annoying. Especially since the case itself is a bother to take off. It makes your iPad weigh a lot compared to normal.
customer_reviews.author: PhantomShopper

customer_reviews.title: Like Case however --- Trying to open it is very difficult
customer_reviews.text: I had to watch a video on how to open the case. It was very difficult, broke figernails had to use credit card, etc. During the process of opening the case the clear cover got scratched. How I don't know. I do like the way the case feels, the protection, the size and the cover/stand.
customer_reviews.author: Much Agape

customer_reviews.title: Top choice in tablet protection
customer_reviews.text: If you want a cover for your iPad which can protect it against almost any assault the Otter Box is a excellent choice. It has a rugged feel to it and though it is a little bit heavy it provides you with confidence that pad is well protected.
customer_reviews.author: William Edward Schenck

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: At the end of the day it is worth spending $50+ to take care of a $300 piece of equipment. The case makes it easy to hold my iPad in my lap and still use it. I love the removable cover and wasn't aware that there is a clear screen protector built into the case. I'm confident that if I were to drop my iPad it would not be damaged.
customer_reviews.author: S. Slater

customer_reviews.title: after receiving this case that i had noticed how this ...
customer_reviews.text: after receiving this case that i had noticed how this case doesn't come with a rubber seal or why they don't add them to cases to keep the water out but either than that i would commend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: thebite

customer_reviews.title: Great besides a few flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Turns your device into a tank Cons: - Device becomes twice its weight - The screen protector will trap any oils or dust underneath itself - Very small hole for the lightning port. - The back of the silicon sags down when holding the device level
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Weltchek

customer_reviews.title: This case is awesome! its a little on the big side but ...
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome! its a little on the big side but its worth the money and a little bit of insurance that your ipad will be protected.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the product has lived up to the advertisement. We purchased the OtterBox to protect our son's iPad from potential drops and whatnot and it has definetly held it's end of the bargain. I would have given it 5 stars but this case more than doubled the weight of the iPad, which tells me that there is still room for further R&D for lighter materials and designs. Keep up the great work OtterBox!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It has saved my iPad alot from being broken after being dropped on the on accident !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaGirl35

customer_reviews.title: Great protection!
customer_reviews.text: Being I have a toddler that will be playing apps I was looking for something very durable and protective. This is my first otterbox and have to say I'm very impressed. Fits perfect, all the buttons work properly once on, can still access everything you need. It feels very sturdy and I can imagine it will withstand many a drop on the floor. The built in screen cover is nice as is the hard cover that doubles as a stand which works quite well. Overall very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Farris

customer_reviews.title: Big n Beefy
customer_reviews.text: If you want to keep your iPad safe its hard to beat this tank! Its big, and beefy and rugged and just the thing to keep an iPad safe on a shop floor.
customer_reviews.author: Britt T

customer_reviews.title: You own an iPad you need this.
customer_reviews.text: The iPad is a well build device, but it won't survive a face plant or a drop onto a hard surface like concrete. If you are really going to use your iPad like a real person this is a must. OtterBox builds one heck, solid, and it doesn't diminish the feel and operation of the iPad. Own an iPad you need to own this.
customer_reviews.author: Lincster45

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox Defender Case for iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift for my son. He bought the iPad Air but didn't have enough money for a nice case for it. I did a search online for something nice and not too expensive to give him and didn't find anything. I went to Amazon.com to look and found this item which hit the spot just perfectly. I should have started there and save all the time I wasted elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: MAdMedTechPerez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but...
customer_reviews.text: It really peeves me that Otterbox couldn't provide just a little clearance for the charging cable so I can use my Amazon Basics cable with my iPad Air. Once again I will be modifying their product so that it can work vs. modifying all of my charging cables. Other than that it is a solid case and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Wilt Chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Very Snug
customer_reviews.text: After you manage to get the Ipad Air into this case, you've accomplished something. I do believe that the OtterBox Case will help Protect the IPAD AIR in the event it takes a short tumble. For OtterBox, you would think that a company that charges $89.95 for a case could at least produce a couple of colors beside BLACK. Everyone likes variety.
customer_reviews.author: Hardware4you

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get any better than this...
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my iPad Air twice in the same day. Once it hit the pavement and later it landed on a tile floor. Guess what? The iPad Air sustained no injuries! THANK YOU, OTTERBOX! See my review on the Otterbox for ipad-mini. The life of your device might be vastly improved by getting an Otterbox.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Corran

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate protection.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if you could design a more protective case. I purchased eight of these and they get carried around from meeting to meeting. I have not heard any complaints from the users. They are bulky, but boy do they protect. The stand feature is great for use during meetings!
customer_reviews.author: Abner

customer_reviews.title: A superior product - wonderful hand feel
customer_reviews.text: A superior product - wonderful hand feel, very high quality - great vendor to deal with = mike in az
customer_reviews.author: sue mulhern

customer_reviews.title: Good Case just wasn't for me
customer_reviews.text: I had the Otterbox case in my ipad 3 and loved it. This case is great too but like others I had a problem with the rainbow effect the screen gave. I returned this as soon as the Lifeproof Nuud case was available. The lifeproof case feels wonderful. I did not want to take the screen protector out of the Otterbox and then still not liking it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case because my daughter is 3 and I feared for the life of my iPad air. I love this case. It is heavy when compared to the air itself but I have no worries that it will drop and break. It is fabulous. I put the cover on and put it in my purse and take it anywhere. Recently traveled with it. The peace of mind this case bought me is priceless!
customer_reviews.author: Maren

customer_reviews.title: If you plan to drop your iPad, get this case.
customer_reviews.text: Don't drop your iPad. If you do, have this case. It has saved my device and screen every time.
customer_reviews.author: larndt

customer_reviews.title: Valuable protection
customer_reviews.text: The OtterBox Defender case seems to provide the protection required to protect my investment and data. If there is a downside it would have to be the weight but if that is what is required to keep my devices from shattering when dropped, I have no problem living with the extra weight.
customer_reviews.author: Bunt

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox Defender Case for iPad Air 2
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packed and they seem to work great. We buy these regularly for our employees and I haven't heard a complaint yet.
customer_reviews.author: Q!

customer_reviews.title: Just right for a klutz
customer_reviews.text: I'm all thumbs and this otterbox is just what I needed to protect my iPad. My previous cover didn't protect the corners so when it fell my screen was cracked. The Otterbox, however, gives protection all around. The built in screen protector fits well over the iPad screen. There isn't a gap between the built in protector and the IPad screen. This wasn't the case all around the edge of an old otterbox for my iPod. This one is an excellent fit. The large plastic cover not only snaps over the front of the iPad but it will snap onto the back as we'll. The cover can also be used as an iPad stand.
customer_reviews.author: David Oberdieck

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the wrong one....should have bought the one for Air 2. Will return this one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Mehlenbacher

customer_reviews.title: Stout
customer_reviews.text: I have no doubt that this case would survive just about anything I put it through except for water submersion. I'm very happy with the fit and all of the viewing angles. Adds a fair amount of weight to a product called the "air" but that's the price for protection, right?
customer_reviews.author: Sequoiadrvr

customer_reviews.title: Another Awesome OtterBox
customer_reviews.text: Just got my OtterBox. I have one for my Kindle Fire Hd and my 2 iPhones and Samsung Note 2. I am kinda rough on things. Always carry them on my motorcycles both on and off road. When I take them out of case, my phones and tablets look brand new!!!! There is only one case for me. OtterBox is the one
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! One of the ends broke while taking tablet out of case!
customer_reviews.author: Lon Edward Ware

customer_reviews.title: Like some others the assembly was difficult
customer_reviews.text: Like some others the assembly was difficult..took me at least an hour out of my day. BUT..once I had it all together I was very happy with the result. Can't beat the protection this case provides! If you are a patient sort..buy it. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: B. GREELEY

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have had the case for a little over a month and i think it is pretty good. The only thing i dont like is under the screen protecter is moisture and there are weird marks from that, that reflect wierd from light but that can be avoided by removing the screen protector or making sure that the the screen is really clean and there is no water or oils from your skin on the screen. Other than that it is a good case and otter box is a pleasure to work with
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Levesque

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Otterbox designers
customer_reviews.text: Very durable product. My 3 year old girl absolutely not having trouble with it. Yes it adds some extra weight and bulkiness but definitely acceptable for this kind of protection. Your wife may not like it, because Ipad Air does not look as elegant as it is. No touch sensitivity loss with additional screen protector. My hands sweat a lot while playing games. It also protect Ipad from my hand sweat. This is very sweet side effect of Otterbox defender. While playing driving games Otterbox's protective case's corner design very helpful to grip. Worth every penny.Thank you Otterbox designers.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Haldun AKASLAN

customer_reviews.title: Don't put it in your backpack...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case. I donned it on my IPad, slipped it in my backpack, and the top cover disconnected, pushed on my screen in a horrible way, and shattered the screen. Very angry I bought this case now. My iPad has never been the same...
customer_reviews.author: cjm007

customer_reviews.title: Fits and works great. The stand is an added bonus! Easy to use too.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, protects great. It’s what we needed. Fits good!
customer_reviews.author: Rusti

customer_reviews.title: not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: not what I was looking for... not easy to use...
customer_reviews.author: Martin Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Such an awesome case! Not recommended if you don't want something ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, he tends to drop his electronics lol. It has saved us from so many accidents. Such an awesome case! Not recommended if you don't want something bulky, but hey, it's worth it if you don't want your tablet breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The one to go for
customer_reviews.text: I went through 2 other cases before this one. I wished this was the case I got in the first place. It is very sturdy and easy to use/prop up. This would have very well prevented the crack in the iPad when my daughter dropped it.
customer_reviews.author: JBHarris

customer_reviews.title: OtterBox Defender
customer_reviews.text: The OtterBox Defender does what it was designed to do, if I could change anything about it I would have the IPAD turn off when the case is applied. Getting the cover on was a challange, I checked out the UTUBE tutorial to help me with that. The cover can be hard to take off at times, but it is strudy and strong. I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AROD

customer_reviews.title: Overall I have used OtterBox for years. This case ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I have used OtterBox for years. This case I got does not fit the Air properly. The rubber in the corners does not stay sealed and the back where the apple logo is droops down when holding it. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: BAM BAM

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but Super Quality
customer_reviews.text: If you travel with your I pad in any capacity I believe it is worth the investment given the cost to fix or replace it. The case offers TOTAL protection and the snap on cover is what separates from any close competitor. This case is a beast.
customer_reviews.author: CTC383

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and has protected my tablet from getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and has protected my tablet from getting damaged quite often. Only issue I have is sometimes when trying to touch the screen to do things, the protective screen doesn't translate it to the tablet well.
customer_reviews.author: Love Books

customer_reviews.title: ipad case
customer_reviews.text: I like the case and the way its build. BUT i keep finding dust and or debris between the case screen protector and the actual ipad screen ,, which made me pretty sad for the price I paid for this case.. It hasn't scratch my screen yet, but i have to take the thing apart weekly to clean it.. I always make sure everything clicks and is attached but I still find that dust finds its way inside the case .. Just thought I share this with you.
customer_reviews.author: tinkles

customer_reviews.title: Good value and protection
customer_reviews.text: Very good protection for my new iPad Air. Versatel positions, snaps in protection. Drop it the other day no problem. My only gripe is things get under the protective film, must disassemble often. Would be a five with out that
customer_reviews.author: mgd675

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It protects my iPad Air perfectly. The only bad thing about it is the sometime the home button on the case gets jammed on the home button and causes Siri to come on. Then I have to take part of the case off to fix it. otherwise its great.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Durability & Quality
customer_reviews.text: Like: Durability, Quality & Ease of Use. Dislike: A little pricey but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LaMonte C. Summers

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, quality cover.
customer_reviews.text: When you buy an iPad, you definitely need some kind of good, heavy duty case if you have kids. You just have to. This case is great...but the "stand" sucks. Not low quality or anything, I'd just prefer a stand that is connected to the case and you just flip it open and stand it up. Just my preference, I would not buy this one again, but not because it's not a quality case. Just personal preference on the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: BEST CASE I HAVE BOUGHT FOR MY IPAD'S
customer_reviews.text: BEST CASE I HAVE BOUGHT FOR MY IPAD'S. I've had a few others cases, each Ipad has gotten cracked because of the case. Fist two cases broke and my ipad slipped out the bottom and cracked. Hints why I went for something heavy duty and still professional looking, I use it at work so it gets handled a lot. A+ +
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: It is great!
customer_reviews.text: best case ever. It stands up on its own and looks awesome as well. It protects very well. I dropped a heavy object on it and it did no damage to the screen portion of the iPad case.
customer_reviews.author: 1rhino1

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this case....fit is inaccurate!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been putting up with the fit of this case for too long and now it's too late to return it. I struggle to use my Touch ID for purchases because the Home button is partially blocked by the case. I regret this purchase very, very much!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case that will not disappoint...
customer_reviews.text: This case is the big brother brother to the iphone Otterbox Defender Series Case. I absolutely love it. It provides the protection I need when my children are using the iPad. The screen cover is translucent and does not effect the touch sensation. I have not used the stand by it's nice to know there is a stand if I ever need it. You could also use the back/stand to cover the iPad completely. At first I felt the cost was a bit expensive but now I believe it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: DWD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because I needed the ipad air 2 case.
customer_reviews.author: kdshorn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just order another one for my mother in law Ipad
customer_reviews.author: James Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the Ipad Wifi
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the Ipad Wifi, except for one of the volume buttons, there is a piece which folds in and out, we just leave it out all the time, as it keeps my sons ipad from breaking on the floor
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Rooney

customer_reviews.title: I am not clumsy!
customer_reviews.text: I am not clumsy! But, after a rigorous workout I missed the first step down a flight of stairs. In classic action movie slow motion I saw my IPad Air fly down an entire flight of stairs. Hitting a couple of the stairs and then bouncing around the corner it came to rest half the way down the adjacent hallway. After hobbling down the rest of the stairs I was sure to discover a shattered screen, at best. Rather, I found the IPad and case in perfect working order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This Otterbox is okay..but I had to remove the plastic over the screen because it did not allow the touch screen to work as easily. Don't think I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Harley3904

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: I like the case full coverage. It covers enough that it doesn't have any difficulty touching the screen by the edges. It is a little heavier than I thought but without the back stand it's a little better also less bulkier but it's minimum bulk all around for a defender series they're usually a lot bulkier. The only thing I don't like about it is that the otter box screen sticks to my screen protector in the inside of the case causing this bubble effect.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great protection - rubber case stretches though
customer_reviews.text: My complaint us that the rubber case the iPad goes into stretches over time. At that point you have to continually keep tucking the iPad back into the case. Excellent protection for a very fragile device.
customer_reviews.author: Long time customer

customer_reviews.title: Great  Great quality ....
customer_reviews.text: The OtterBox was great; new in the box everything was top quality wish I could give it 10 stars; it worked perfect for my iPad Air
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: within 3 months one third of the led's burned out!!!!! .....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great box. For my young son to protect his ...
customer_reviews.text: Great box. For my young son to protect his pad. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Garden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husbands new ipad. It's perfect. Keeps the iPad safe but is not too bulky like some of the older otter boxes were in the past. Even ordered myself a pink one for my iPad
customer_reviews.author: Sherilynn77

customer_reviews.title: great stand and
customer_reviews.text: This is the semiconductor one I’ve owned in 5 years, great stand and case
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Bush

product_meta.title: OtterBox Defender Series Case for iPad Air - Retail Packaging - Black
product_meta.description:
TRUSTED, RUGGED PROTECTION
The Apple iPad Air is the lightest and most powerful of the iPads. The OtterBox Defender Series case is designed to protect this device in all the environments where you like to use it.

OtterBox Defender Series Case for iPad AirView larger View larger RUGGED, MULTI-LAYER CASE
OtterBox is the innovator of the first multi-layer case. Since that first case many have tried to create something similar, but nothing beats the original. Innovative engineering and precision design work together to create this multi-layer case that provides trusted protection against drops, dust, scratches, and shock.

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS
The Defender Series is made up of a two-piece polycarbonate inner shell that deflects impact force, a self-adhering screen protector that guards against scratches and scrapes and an outer durable synthetic rubber slip cover that absorbs impact. These materials work together to take on the heavy use and accidental abuse that can happen to your vital device.

INCLUDED SHIELD STAND
This Defender Series case comes standard with a shield stand. This stand provides added protection when covering the touch screen during transport. It also provides for convenient use with comfortable typing and viewing angles.

TECHNOLOGY USE WITHOUT WORRY
This is the case you need if you want to be careless, are tough on technology, anticipate heavy use, or are just plain clumsy. Enjoy your reading wherever you like, without worrying about damaging your iPad Air along the way.

IT’S AN OTTERBOX
With any OtterBox protective solution, you can expect a premium product from the #1 most trusted case brand in smartphone protection.* Known for rugged protective products, OtterBox cases deliver incredibly tough protection to prevail through your always-on lifestyle. Adventure confidently and take your device with you knowing you have OtterBox protection on your side. *Source: The NPD Group/U.S. Consumer Tracking Service, 1/2012-6/2013

View larger 
DEFENDER SERIES CASE FEATURES
 * Robust, 3-layer protective case withstands drops, bumps, and shock
 * Built-in screen protector guards against scratches and scrapes to the touch screen
 * Port covers block dust and debris from entering and accumulating in ports and jacks
 * Included shield stand accommodates comfortable viewing and typing angles
 * Shield stand provides added protection during transport
feature_bullets: only compatible with the original iPad Air and will not work with any other generation of iPad Air series, such as the Air 2 or Air 3.
Triple-layer defense: inner shell, outer cover and touchscreen protector
Screen protection: built in to keep your brilliant display flawless
Port covers: stop dirt, dust and lint from getting into jacks and ports
Shield stand: includes stand for hands-free convenience
Robust, 3-layer protection withstands drops, bumps and shocks
Port covers keep out dust and debris

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars726 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
